attributes.action: make the cost of traveling to and from work tax deductible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With increasing costs of fuel, train & bus travel, motorway tolls, congestion charges and only an increase of 2 to 3% in our wages each year, we will soon not be ables to travel to and from work. M.P's can already claim for their travel plus many other expenditure, why can't the normal tax paying worker claim for his expenses to and from work? In most cases, this day and age, it is a substantial amount out of their income after tax. Maybe we should all go selfemploied and be in control of our own money.
